required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Angiomatoid Fibrous Histiocytoma: a Single Institution Case-series
clinical_study.official_title: Angiomatoid Fibrous Histiocytoma: a Single Institution Case-series

brief_summary.textblock: single institution cases series review of histological and clinical data

detailed_description.textblock: single institution cases series review of histological and clinical data Investigators will retrieve from the archives of the Rizzoli Institute all the cases with a histological diagnosis of Angiomatoid Fibrous Histiocytoma. In all cases with enough available material, immunohistochemistry will be performed on slides/formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded tissue tumor material.

primary_outcome.measure: selection and review of 9 cases of Angiomatoid Fibrous Histiocytoma
primary_outcome.description: investigators will review all the medical records, radiological imaging, and histological slides of all cases to identify the best therapeutic approach.

primary_outcome.measure: analysis of EWS-CREB1 and EWS-ATF1 mutation and ALK expression on tissue tumor material
primary_outcome.description: In all cases immunohistochemistry will be performed on slides/formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded tissue tumor material. EWS-CREB1 and EWS-ATF1 mutation and ALK expression will be analyzed with RT-PCR and/or FISH analysis.

biospec_descr.textblock: immunohistochemistry will be performed on FFPE material. EWS-CREB1 and EWS-ATF1 mutation and ALK expression will be analyzed with RT-PCR and/or FISH analysis.

study_pop.textblock: Male and Female with diagnosis of Angiomatoid Fibrous Histiocytoma with histological slides/formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded tissue tumor blocks from archive available to perform the histology analysis

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Male and female patients treated at Rizzoli Institute from 01 January 2006 to 31 December 2017
- Diagnosis of Angiomatoid Fibrous Histiocytoma
- Histological slides/formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded tissue tumor (FFPE) blocks from archive available to perform the histology analysis
- Written informed consent prior to any study-specific analysis and/or data collection
Exclusion Criteria:
â€¢ Patients with histological diagnosis different from Angiomatoid Fibrous Histiocytoma

Bohman SL, Goldblum JR, Rubin BP, Tanas MR, Billings SD. Angiomatoid fibrous histiocytoma: an expansion of the clinical and histological spectrum. Pathology. 2014 Apr;46(3):199-204. doi: 10.1097/PAT.0000000000000073.

Chen G, Folpe AL, Colby TV, Sittampalam K, Patey M, Chen MG, Chan JK. Angiomatoid fibrous histiocytoma: unusual sites and unusual morphology. Mod Pathol. 2011 Dec;24(12):1560-70. doi: 10.1038/modpathol.2011.126. Epub 2011 Aug 5.

Noujaim J, Jones RL, Swansbury J, Gonzalez D, Benson C, Judson I, Fisher C, Thway K. The spectrum of EWSR1-rearranged neoplasms at a tertiary sarcoma centre; assessing 772 tumour specimens and the value of current ancillary molecular diagnostic modalities. Br J Cancer. 2017 Feb 28;116(5):669-678. doi: 10.1038/bjc.2017.4. Epub 2017 Jan 31.

Rossi S, Szuhai K, Ijszenga M, Tanke HJ, Zanatta L, Sciot R, Fletcher CD, Dei Tos AP, Hogendoorn PC. EWSR1-CREB1 and EWSR1-ATF1 fusion genes in angiomatoid fibrous histiocytoma. Clin Cancer Res. 2007 Dec 15;13(24):7322-8.

patient_data.ipd_description: No Individual Patient Data sharing plan has been implemented
